column1: Unemployment is rising among youth in urban areas.
Climate change is causing floods and extreme weather.
Many students lack access to quality education.
Women face harassment in public transport.
Air pollution is increasing respiratory diseases.
Mental health awareness is still low in rural regions.
Water scarcity is becoming a serious issue.
Farmers are struggling with debt and crop failure.
Deforestation is increasing due to urban expansion.
Food prices are rising due to inflation.
Child labor is still present in many areas.
Drug abuse is increasing among teenagers.
Public transport safety is a concern.
Access to clean drinking water is limited.
Farmers protest for better crop prices.
Air quality index is worsening in cities.
Mental stress among students is rising.
Youth migration to cities is increasing.
Women's safety laws need strict implementation.
